Assail.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Activating In Pursuit generates {scale=2|2} ammo.

Commencement.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Increase the distance of Combat Slide by {scale=10|10}%

Compel.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Reduce the Cooldown of In Pursuit by {scale=1|1}s.

Death Hastens.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Weapon Shots deal 680 damage and fire slower.

Discovery.card_desc: [Retribution] Deal 30% more damage to your Retribution target and reduce the Cooldown of Retribution by 15s.

Fortitude.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Every shot hit with In Pursuit heals you for {scale=25|25} Health.

Hardiness.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction during In Pursuit.

Heroism.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Gain 90% Damage Reduction and CC Immunity while using Combat Slide.

Inescapable.card_desc: [Retribution] You gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed when you are within 60 units of your Retribution target.

Justice Served.card_desc: [Retribution] Killing your target refills {scale=15|15}% of your maximum Health.

Keen Sight.card_desc: [Retribution] Increase the range at which your target becomes visible by {scale=10|10} units.

Requip.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Activating Combat Slide generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

The Hunted.card_desc: [Retribution] You gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against your Retribution target.

Warrants Out.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 2s after Combat Slide ends.

Wicked Don't Rest.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Hitting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of Combat Slide by {scale=5|5}%
